WorkItem.Description:
The Misc. category in the Refine Types of Items Selection window is too broad spectrum.  Unchecking it removes all cloaks, rings, necks, off-hand-non-weapon and trinkets from the available item list unless the user has already marked that item for availability.
 
Example: When using the Optimizer or Rawr in general, off-hand-non-weapon items are being populated in the list.  These items are obviously trivial to a TankDK, but by being in the list, it makes it available to the Optimzer and Find Upgrade lists, which can throw off possible legit upgrades for the user.
 
Solutions:
1 - Advise user to delete items they don't want manually from the Edit Items DB
2 - Have each dev code their module to auto-filter off-hand-non-weapon items.
3 - Create sub-categories for item types that are available to beyond just Shields and Misc.  Create Neck, Ring, Trinket, Off-hand-non-weapon filters.
4 - Close this issue because it's working as intended, you idiot -Astyllian :P

Comments.Message: Much <3.  So glad we have this fantastic Issue Trackers system to report things and can discuss issues as to why things are and aren't the way they are.  So much better than those 'Discussion' threads in that other place.

...what? I can't even tell if that was supposed to be sarcasm or not.

If you have something to discuss, bring it up. I don't see any argument for doing anything different here. Rawr doesn't determine item types, Blizzard does.
